content: video here - https //www instagram com/dotpebbles_knits/reels/ 1 little lighted up knitted seasonal decorations - so many uses for these they do turn on and off too the light within is an led balloon light - available almost everywhere i should imagine amazon or light in the box sell them in the uk and us i ve also given you a variation whereby you can attach them to a string of led fairy lights - such fun the knitting itself is simple enough and a sure way to use up your stash i ve suggested knitting them flat but they are easily adapted for working in the round as well as the balloon light and your yarn and needles you ll need some glue and that s it hope you enjoy making them - apologies if it s a new obsession for you claire x 1 https //www instagram com/dotpebbles_knits/reels/
